channel.title: How to edit a weapons stats to make it a 1 hit kill? [718]
channel.description: I have recently made a 718 server and I want to make Silverlight a 1 hit kill weapon that is only for Owners. I have tried editing the bonuses, but it still didn't make the weapon a 1 hit kill. I am kinda noobish and I'm not very good at coding. Please help!

item.title: How to edit a weapons stats to make it a 1 hit kill? [718]
item.dc:creator: @MrSnow1 MrSnow1
item.description:
@MrSnow1 wrote:

-Item.cfg
-find your weapon
Then you see this

ItemID-Name-Description-0-0-0-attStab-attSlash-Attxx-attMag-attRang-defStab-defSlash-Defxx-defMag-defRang-STRENGTH-prayer

Edit STRENGTH to control your hit. So set it to 111111.

That wi’ll hurt anyone except you.

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit a weapons stats to make it a 1 hit kill? [718]

item.title: How to edit a weapons stats to make it a 1 hit kill? [718]
item.dc:creator: @RunePKn00b RunePKn00b
item.description:
@RunePKn00b wrote:

Why not check itemdb.biz if you have a perfect ring already coded on your server , if not make one for owners only its more useful for all weapons instead of being restricted to 1 wep
